synopsis.text: After the sudden disappearance of the legendary virtual artist, AI Kizuna, the virtual entertainment industry is left in awe and wonder. Meanwhile, at the prestigious ADEN Academy, a new generation of aspiring virtual talents is being trained, including the young and determined Miracle. With dreams of becoming as famous as her idol, AI Kizuna, Miracle embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning the ropes of singing, performing, and streaming. Alongside her fellow contestants, she aims to make a name for herself and perform on the biggest stages, ultimately striving to win the coveted Lapin d'Or at the Virtual Grid Awards, a title AI Kizuna held for five consecutive years. As Miracle and her friends chase their dreams, they form unbreakable bonds and create unforgettable memories in the world of virtual entertainment. Will Miracle be able to inspire others as her idol once inspired her? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
